citation: Proclamation under the Nature Conservation Act 2002 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Nature Conservation Act 2002

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 11(2) of the Nature Conservation Act 2002 declare –

        (a) the Crown land specified in Part 1 of Schedule 1 to this proclamation to be reserved land in the class of conservation area and give the name Little Pine Lagoon Conservation Area to that reserved land; and
        (b) the Crown land specified in Part 2 of Schedule 1 to this proclamation to be reserved land in the class of conservation area and give the name Mount Rumney Conservation Area to that reserved land; and
        (c) the Crown land specified in Part 3 of Schedule 1 to this proclamation to be reserved land in the class of conservation area and give the name Southwest Conservation Area to that reserved land; and
        (d) that this proclamation takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.
19 March 2012

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

BRIAN WIGHTMAN

Minister for Environment, Parks and Heritage

SCHEDULE 1 - Areas of Land

PART 1 - Little Pine Lagoon Conservation Area

All that area of land comprising –
        (a) about 1.693 hectares, shown as Lot 1; and
        (b) about 1.089 hectares, shown as Lot 2 –
bounded by heavy black lines on Plan 9400 in the Central Plan Register, a reduced copy of which is set out, by way of illustration only, in Part 1 of Schedule 2 to this proclamation.

PART 2 - Mount Rumney Conservation Area

All that area of land comprising about 5.646 hectares, shown as Lot 1 and bounded by a heavy black line on Plan 9361 in the Central Plan Register, a reduced copy of which is set out, by way of illustration only, in Part 2 of Schedule 2 to this proclamation.

PART 3 - Southwest Conservation Area

All that area of land comprising about 273.8 hectares, shown as Lot 1 (in 18 parts) and bounded by heavy black lines on Plan 9392 in the Central Plan Register, a reduced copy of which is set out, by way of illustration only, in Part 3 of Schedule 2 to this proclamation.

SCHEDULE 2 - Plans

PART 1 - Little Pine Lagoon Conservation Area

PART 2 - Mount Rumney Conservation Area

PART 3 - Southwest Conservation Area

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 28 March 2012

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Primary Industries, Parks, Water and Environment.
